net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd

Class FieldComponentDropTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.dnd.FieldComponentDropTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DropTarget

    public class FieldComponentDropTarget
extends Object
implements DropTarget
    A drop target to copy String data into a Field.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FieldComponentDropTarget

        public FieldComponentDropTarget(Field fld)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Create a new instance. The ComponentImpl.setDropTarget(DropTarget) will be called on the Field.
        Parameters:
        fld - the field component.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the field is null.

    • Method Detail

      • drop

        public void drop(Transferable transferable,
        DropLocationIdentifier location,
        DropOption option)
        Description copied from interface: DropTarget
        Process the result of a drag and drop operation. If an error occurs it is the responsibility of this method to take appropriate action such as displaying a message.
        Specified by:
        drop in interface DropTarget
        Parameters:
        transferable - the data from the source.
        location - the enum value at the location of the drop as defined by DropTarget.getDropLocations(), may be null.
        option - the option the user has chosen for the drop, may be null.

      • getAcceptedContentTypes

        public Collection<ContentType> getAcceptedContentTypes()
        Description copied from interface: DropTarget
        Get the supported content types for this target. This method may be called many times in a short period of time and should be efficient.
        Specified by:
        getAcceptedContentTypes in interface DropTarget
        Returns:
        Collection of ContentType.

      • getDropLocations

        public DropLocation getDropLocations()
        Description copied from interface: DropTarget
        Get the description of the drop locations.
        Specified by:
        getDropLocations in interface DropTarget
        Returns:
        DropLocation, must not be null.

      • getDropOptions

        public Collection<DropOption> getDropOptions(Transferable transferable)
        Description copied from interface: DropTarget
        Get the options for dropping the given Transferable.
        Specified by:
        getDropOptions in interface DropTarget
        Parameters:
        transferable - the transferable that may be given in DropTarget.drop(Transferable, DropLocationIdentifier, DropOption).
        Returns:
        collection of drop options, may be empty but not null.

      • hasDropOptions

        public boolean hasDropOptions()
        Description copied from interface: DropTarget
        Check if the target may return more than one DropOption from DropTarget.getDropOptions(Transferable). This method should return true if at least one condition would cause multiple drop options to be available. It must be a stable value over the lifetime of the DropTarget.
        Specified by:
        hasDropOptions in interface DropTarget
        Returns:
        true if there is a possibility of multiple drop options from DropTarget.getDropOptions(Transferable).
